Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/projects
Synopsis Retrieve the set of project locations of the current Eclipse workspace.
Function set[loc] projects()
Examples The following example shows the projects as they existed when this page was generated: 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>projects();
set[loc]: {
  |project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values|,
  |project://Marvol|,
  |project://rascal-eclipse|,
  |project://Test|,
  |project://ABC|,
  |project://HelloWorld|,
  |project://rascal|,
  |project://Check|
}
